document_data.name: ''Warrior's Duo''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''warrior's duo''''' was an [[enchanted]] set of equipment consisting of a [[short sword]] and a [[shield]] with matching protective [[magical]] properties. This equipment could be found in [[Waterdeep]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: The blade of the ''warrior's duo'' hit harder than a mundane blade, and when it hit particularly hard, the ''duo'' released protective magic that bolstered the defenses of not only the wielder but their allies as well.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Tommus Tallstep]], a [[halfling]] [[fighter]] who worked as an [[adventurer]] on behalf of [[Laeral Silverhand]], the [[Open Lord]] of Waterdeep, during the late 15{{th}} century DR.
